title: Cobb, W. Johnson, Marquard T206s for Sale or Trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Cobb, W. Johnson, Marquard T206s for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dustin
     Just looking for trade or PayPal.  Looking for offers, so post here or email me (will reply to emails faster).  I am fairly new here, but my feedback on eBay and other forums is PERFECT.  Here is what I have available:

Ty Cobb - Red Background - Piedmont Back (not 100%, but top of card looks to have been trimmed).
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/CobbT206.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/CobbT206back.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

Walter Johnson - Portrait - Sweet Caporal Back 
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/JohnsonT206.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/JohnsonT206back.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

Rube Marquard - Throwing - Sweet Caporal Back - Card is pretty sharp, unaltered, should do well if graded.
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/marquard.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/marquardbackSWEET.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

and throwing this out there also...

1951 Bowman Mickey Mantle Rookie - Has pen mark on end of bat otherwise VERY NICE - probably would grade a 3.
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/51mantlerc.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/51mantlercback.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

Thank you for your time.
Dustin Thompson
jdtcards
dustinthompson@comcast.net
